activations.number: Il y a {count} activations LXP actives
activations.none: Il n'y a pas d'activation active
activations.one: Il y a {count} activation LXP active

lxpAddress.heading: fr-Linea XP wallet address
lxpAddress.prompt: fr-Please enter the wallet address linked to your LXP

nextSteps.heading: fr-Thank you for installing the LXP Snap
nextSteps.body: fr-Next, set your address with the [companion site](https://lxp-snap.linea.build/) to track your Linea XP balance. At any time you can open the Snaps menu and click on LXP to view your balance, Proof of Humanity status, and current activations.

noAddress.toSetText: fr-To view your LXP balance and POH status,

help: fr-LXP earned in activations may not arrive in your wallet until the activation is complete.

errors.heading: fr-Error
errors.invalidLxpAddress: fr-{address} is not a valid address. Please try again.
